generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and pedestrian crossings.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, with curbs separating them from the road.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural features are visible in the background and along the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible on the right side of the image.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, showing a red arrow pointing right.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and a "Parking" sign.
- train: A modern tram is visible on the tracks, moving along the street.
- terrain: Small patches of grass or vegetation are visible along the sidewalk edges.
